categories: Category:Military personnel of Revan's Sith Empire

nodes.text: A Sith trooper who served in Darth Malak's Sith Empire carried a vial of Rakghoul serum during a mission to the Undercity on the planet of Taris. After they perished, the Galactic Republic soldier Revan recovered the serum and gave it to the doctor Zelka Forn.
